titles.title: A resolution congratulating the people of the Republic of Lithuania on the Act of the Re-Establishment of the State of Lithuania, or Act of March 11, and celebrating the rich history of Lithuania.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: 3/4/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the people of the Republic of Lithuania on the occasion of the Act of the Re-Establishment of the State of Lithuania. Commends the government of Lithuania for its success in implementing political and economic reforms, for establishing political, religious, and economic freedoms, and for its commitment to human rights. Recognizes the close relationship between the U.S. and Lithuanian governments and calls on the President to continue to build on this relationship.
